hotels.title: Luxembourg City Oasis with French-Inspired Restaurant & Stylish Bar
hotels.description: Rising above Luxembourg’s historic Petrusse Valley, this five-star retreat offers sweeping views over the UNESCO-listed Old Town and the gleaming Alzette River. Step outside to wander the cobbled streets of Grund, discover the Grand Ducal Palace or explore the atmospheric Bock Casemates tunnels - the best of the city is within easy reach. Within the hotel, savour French-inspired cuisine at the panoramic top-floor restaurant, or enjoy pastries and artisan coffee by morning and handcrafted cocktails by night at the elegant L’Observatoire. Keep up your routine at the state-of-the-art fitness facilities before retreating to your stylish room or suite.

hotels.title: Stylish Luxembourg Five-Star City Oasis near MUDAM with Two Restaurants & Chic Bar
hotels.description: Discover a world of understated European elegance and classic French decadence with a stay at this five-star sanctuary, ideally positioned in the heart of Luxembourg's Kirchberg district. Set beneath a soaring glass atrium, this architectural icon boasts sumptuous rooms, excellent dining and a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Savour homemade Italian cuisine at Radici and traditional Luxembourger dishes at De Feierwon, then unwind with fine whiskies or oriental teas at SixtyFour bar. Just a short walk from Europe’s leading institutions (including MUDAM, the Philharmonie Luxembourg and European Convention Centre) and with tram access to the Old City of Luxembourg, this contemporary city break is perfect for both culture lovers and discerning city explorers.
